front.title: Surprise Counter Assault
front.gametext: Cancel Counter Assault. OR Use 4 Force to cancel opponent's Force drain at an exterior Endor site. Deploy (for free) from Reserve Deck any number of non-unique Ewoks to that site (Dark Side characters, vehicles and starships here may 'escape' to Used Pile).
front.lore: Chief Chirpa led his Ewok warriors in a counterattack that captured many Imperial soldiers outside the Endor control bunker.

pulls: Any number of non-unique Ewok to an Endor site
combo: lotsa Ewok Sentries + Surprise Counter Assault + Endor: Hidden Forest Trail = the drain is cancelled, the Ewoks get deployed from Reserve Deck for free at a site with 2 Light Side icons, and if you scare the Dark Side characters to the Used Pile, then from the Forest Trail you can get them to any exterior Endor site you wish!
